title: How to write without thinking - Quora

response.answer_text: We have two modes of thinking: “rational” and “emotional” (wrongly named “right” and “left” side of the brain types of thinking). There’s a good book that can teach you about switching between these modes consciously as you see fit: “Drawing on the right side of the brain”. The book is not just about drawing. Writers find it useful too.

Unless you’re exceptionally gifted in the art of writing, there’s no way to write without thinking. There’s another way though. Practise writing as much as you can. It’ll eventually improve you over the course of time.
